title: Mounties could enter homes to enforce Quarantine Act orders if Canadians don’t self-isolate - The Globe and Mail

content: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau addresses Canadians on the COVID-19 pandemic from Rideau Cottage in Ottawa on Thursday, April 9, 2020. The RCMP says arrests under the act, violations of which could include a fine of up to $750,000 and imprisonment for six month… [+4902 chars]
